name: HoloSchool
description:
The pieces have been placed and the game is set. What unknown hand moves the pieces forward? You are just an average school student set to live out a normal life, but the path ahead is anything but. Can you survive the game that you've been forced to participate in? And who will be by your side when the dust settles? 

A visual novel about budding companionship and the weight of our own identities that we carry on our shoulders.
